text: Keisuke no naka de, anata gata ni tashika ni kunkai shita. Moshi arra no shirushi ga kyohi sa re, matawa chosho sa reru no o anata gataga mimi ni surunaraba, kare-ra ga soto no hanashi ni utsuru made kare-ra to doseki shite wa naranai. Anata gataga (doseki) shitanaraba, kare-ra to dorui ni naru. Hontoni arra wa nise shinja to fushinjin no mono o, subete jigoku no naka ni atsume rareru
